story:
Once upon a time, in a small village nestled in the lush green valley of the majestic Himalayas, there lived a kind and curious little boy named Arjun. Arjun's parents were loving and wise, and they taught him the importance of being honest, compassionate, and hardworking.

Arjun loved playing in the village, running through the fields, and listening to the stories of the wise old men who gathered near the village temple every evening to share their wisdom and experiences. Arjun's favorite stories were those of great kings, mighty warriors, and magical creatures that lived in the forests and the sky.

One day, Arjun heard a story that particularly fascinated him. It was the tale of a rare and magical bird that lived high up in the Himalayas, known as the Snow Dove. The Snow Dove was said to have beautiful white feathers that shimmered and sparkled like diamonds, and its song was believed to bring joy and happiness to all who heard it. But the Snow Dove was also known to be elusive, as it only appeared to those who had a pure heart and a kind soul.

Arjun was so captivated by the story of the Snow Dove that he decided he would do whatever it took to see it for himself. He packed some food, water, and warm clothes and set off on his journey before the sunrise. He hiked for hours, climbing up the rugged mountain trails, crossing rushing streams, and finally reaching the snow-capped peaks of the Himalayas.

As he climbed higher, the air grew colder and thinner, but Arjun did not stop. He was determined to see the Snow Dove. Finally, after a long and arduous journey, Arjun reached a flat, snowy plateau, where he saw a beautiful sight. There, amidst the pure white snow, stood a magnificent bird, its feathers shimmering and sparkling like diamonds in the sunlight.

Arjun approached the bird slowly, so as not to startle it. As he got closer, he could hear the sweetest and most melodious song he had ever heard. It was the Snow Dove, singing its enchanting song. Arjun was overjoyed and thanked the bird for showing itself to him.

The Snow Dove looked at Arjun and spoke in a gentle voice, "I have been watching you, young one, and I am pleased with your determination and the purity of your heart. You have come a long way, and I will grant you a wish. What do you wish for?"

Arjun thought for a moment and then said, "I wish for the ability to help others, just as you brought me joy and happiness with your song."

The Snow Dove smiled at Arjun and granted his wish. "Your wish is granted, young one. Now go back to your village and share your love and kindness with all who cross your path."

Arjun thanked the Snow Dove and began his journey back to his village. As he descended the mountain, he met many travelers who were struggling to climb up the trail. Arjun offered them food, water, and words of encouragement, and they were all grateful for his kindness.

When Arjun returned to his village, he was greeted with cheers and embraces. He told his friends and family about his journey to see the Snow Dove, and they were all amazed by his bravery and determination.

From that day on, Arjun lived a life full of kindness, compassion, and generosity. He helped those in need, shared his knowledge and wisdom, and always had a smile on his face. And the villagers remembered the story of the Snow Dove, who had granted Arjun's wish and brought joy and happiness to their village.

Arjun lived a long and fulfilling life, and his kindness and compassion were remembered and passed down for generations. And every time someone heard the story of the Snow Dove, they were reminded of the power of a pure heart and a kind soul.

And with that, my dear son, it is time for you to close your eyes and drift off to sleep, knowing that you too have a pure heart and a kind soul. Goodnight.
